summary: 专线网关ECR（Express Connect Router）关联专有网络（VPC）或者转发路由器（TR）。

schema.description:
转发路由器实例所属阿里云账号（主账号）ID。默认值为当前登录的阿里云账号ID。

> 如果您要加载跨账号的网络实例，本参数必填。

VPC实例所属阿里云账号（主账号）ID。默认为当前登录的阿里云账号ID。

> 如果您要加载跨账号的网络实例，本参数必填。

ECR绑定TR时是否发起关联。取值：

- **true**：不需要在转发路由器侧发起关联。
- **false**：需要在转发路由器侧发起关联。

是否只预检此次请求。取值：

- **true**：发送检查请求，不会修改服务资源。

- **false**（默认值）：发送正常请求。

客户端Token，用于保证请求的幂等性。

从您的客户端生成一个参数值，确保不同请求间该参数值唯一。ClientToken只支持ASCII字符。

> 若您未指定，则系统自动使用API请求的**RequestId**作为**ClientToken**标识。每次API请求的**RequestId**不一样。

Success.description:
是否调用成功。取值：

- **True**：成功。
- **False**：失败。

Code.description: 判断调用是否成功。返回值为200表示加载成功，返回其他值表示加载失败，失败原因参见错误码。

DynamicMessage.description:
动态错误信息，用于替换返回参数**ErrMessage**错误信息中的`%s`。

> 如果**ErrMessage**返回**The Value of Input Parameter %s is not valid**，且**DynamicMessage**返回**DtsJobId**，则表示所传入的请求参数**DtsJobId**不合法。
DynamicMessage.example: The param format of EcrId **** is illegal.

400.errorMessage: Ecr Status does not allow current operation.
The current instance is being deleted.
Feature not supported in specified region.
The number of VPC bound to the ECR exceeds the quota.
The number of TR bound to the ECR exceeds the quota.
The prefix parameter format is invalid. Procedure.
The node owner is not authorized.
The Cdt function is disabled.
The Cdt cross-border transmission function is disabled.
There is no qualification for creating cross-border links.
CenId not found.
TRId not found.
ASN already used by other VBR.
The param of %s is missing.
The param format of %s is illegal.
The format of the entered Cen instance ID is incorrect.
Cross-border binding of resources is subject to compliance constraints.
A private network instance cannot be bound to a forwarding router instance at the same time.
The number of prefix routes exceeded the quota.
If the forwarding router is bound to another account, perform this operation on the same account.
Only one forwarding router can be bound to an area.
There are other unfinished operations.
The system is abnormal. Please try again later.

title: 专线网关（ECR）关联资源
